title: Integration tests for node-pty runner
description: Write tests BEFORE implementing MP-007. Mock node-pty, test dual-output streams, test event emission. These tests catch regressions during implementation.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Test: onData callback receives output chunks
Test: onExit callback receives exit code
Test: display stream preserves ANSI codes
Test: file stream strips ANSI codes
Test: both streams receive same content
Test: events have correct format (type, timestamp, data)
Test: data events include ansi flag
Test: SIGINT propagates to child process
Test: graceful shutdown closes all streams
All tests pass: bun test ralph-ui/tests/runner/
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
